content:
To commission me, read and agree my T.O.S (Terms of services)
Read before ordering any artwork. They are for personal use only (please contact me for commercial licensing) ğŸ’œâ€ŠI-Contact:
Via my socials or please use the form
language spoken :
French English Portuguese (Brazilian) Spanish ğŸ’œâ€ŠII- Common Sense:
Be polite No spamming the rights to decline commissions is at my discretion ğŸ’œâ€ŠIII-Payment:
All payments are upfront I take Paypal and bank transfer Prices are non-negotiable ğŸ’œâ€ŠIV-What do I draw?
I draw :
safe for work material
Any species (real or fantasy) Anthropomorphic characters Feral Toony Kidâ€™s illustration Chibis Pets NSFW material +18:
erotism/explicit NSFW/ BDSM / Kinks I donâ€™t draw:
Realism Humans complex backgrounds Some fetishism such as watersports, scat, vomitâ€¦ ğŸ’œâ€ŠV- Ordering:
Iâ€™ll add you on my Trello (waiting list). You have to be over 18 y/o to be able to commission me an NSFW artwork Payment will be on Paypal or bank transfer. -Send me one or multiple references of your character , or describe it as much as possible. Sketch validation. You can ask as many modifications as you please without any charges After the sketch, iâ€™ll send you the line art. Charges may apply if you ask for major changes I will then send you the finished product ğŸ’œâ€ŠVI- The Waiting list:
All potential customers will be put in here. There is no engagement until the commission is fully paid. Even though there is no engagement , it would be nice to notify me in case of cancellation or delaying of the project. ğŸ’œâ€ŠVII- Cancellation:
No refunds in general. Iâ€™m only providing refunds if Iâ€™m unable to finish he project ğŸ’œâ€ŠVIII- Delivery:
Iâ€™ll keep you updated on my progression as much as possible. Waiting time will depend of your position on the waiting list (post payment) I donâ€™t have any defined deadlines, but I will try to work as fast as I can! If you want your artwork to be delivered at a specific date, please notify me (extra fees may apply) ğŸ’œâ€ŠIX - Donâ€™t :
Remove my signature from the finished artwork Make unauthorized modifications on said artwork ğŸ’œâ€ŠX: Extras:
Donâ€™t forget to credit me if you can. I will repost all the drawings on my socials and most likely on my pricelist as examples If itâ€™s a gift, please donâ€™t forget to notify me, so I donâ€™t post it at my socials and spoil the surprise. Conract if you have any questions, or simply wants to give some constructive feedback !
title: T.O.S (Terms of services)
